meaningMnemonic: Something is both <kanji>white</kanji> and <kanji>black</kanji>. It is <vocabulary>black and white</vocabulary> (you can also say <vocabulary>white and black</vocabulary> if you prefer).
readingMnemonic: The readings are kun'yomi, but you should have seen both 白 and 黒い separately as vocabulary by now. It's the same readings here, so you can apply that knowledge and read this word!
